hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #the Requiem of Spirit#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a #single Upgrade Deku Scrub#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that Sheik waits at a #monument to time# to teach #the Sun's Song#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #the Market# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Ice Cavern#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: Remember when Ganon was a blue pig?^I remember.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #the Stone of Agony#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #Twinrova#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Compass Room Side Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a #generic grotto#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Map of the Fire Temple#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #3# major items.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #an Ice Trap#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ZF (Jabu).text: Remember that time you did that really embarrassing thing?^${12 68 3A}Yikes.
